properties.name: Mode
properties.summary: Gets or sets the scale map mode.

properties.name: MinScale
properties.summary: Gets or sets the minimum scale factor (0.1..1.0).

properties.name: MaxScale
properties.summary: Gets or sets the maximum scale factor (0.1..1.0).

properties.name: RingSize
properties.summary: Gets or sets the ring size in modules for .

properties.name: Seed
properties.summary: Gets or sets the random seed for .

properties.name: ApplyToEyes
properties.summary: When true, applies scale mapping to finder (eye) modules.
